modName: Anyone as follower or spouse plus divorce option
summary:
Make follower of anyone.
Marry anyone you want.
Divorce if you are tired of your spouse.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b][color=#DB7900]MAKE FOLLOWER or SPOUSE FROM ANYONE[/color][/b][/size]

[size=5][u][b]INSTALLATION AND USING: [/b][/u][/size]
1) Copy .txt files into your /skyrim or /skyrim/data folder
2) Ingame open console by hitting \"~\" 
3) Click on npc you want to be your follower
4) Then write \"bat name_of_file\" without quotes.
5) Close console with ESC
6) Talk with npc you used this on
7) Select dialogue option \"Follow me, I need your help.\" or option for marriage.
8) Profit

[size=5][u][b]DESCRIPTION OF EACH FILE: [/b][/u][/size]

[size=3][b]follower.txt[/b][/size]
- command: \"bat follower\"
- Force npc to be your ally and to have dialogue options for potential followers.
- Make\'s npc your ally and you can enter command mode.
[s]- It also make npc killable (not essential) even if defaultly isn\'t.[/s]
- This works even in combat and on enemies.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[s]efollower.txt
- command: \"bat efollower\"
- Force npc to be your ally and to have dialogue options for potential followers.
- Make\'s npc your ally and you can enter command mode.
- It also make npc UNkillable (essential) even if defaultly isn\'t.
- This works even in combat and on enemies.[/s]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][b]argonian.txt[/b][/size]
- command: \"bat argonian\"
- Works only on FEW argonian females.
- Force npc to be your ally and to have dialogue options for potential followers.
- Make\'s npc your ally and you can enter command mode.
[s]- It also make npc killable (not essential) even if defaultly isn\'t.[/s]
- This works even in combat and on enemies.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][b]spouse.txt[/b][/size]
- command: \"bat spouse\"
- Force npc to be your ally and to have dialogue options for potential spouse.
- Make\'s npc your lover.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][b]divorce.txt[/b][/size]
- command: \"bat divorce\"
- Delete marriage status from player and npc.
- Resets marriage quest.
- Active quest again.
use: do steps 1-5 and that\'s all ..skip 6,7.. 


[size=5][u][b]CHANGE LOG:[/b][/u][/size]
2.0 - added 2 new files: 
		spouse.txt (make spouse of anyone)
		dicorce.txt (you can marry again and someone else)
1.1 [s]- now setting npc killable.[/s]
        - more npcs avaliable as followers			
	- added 2 new files: -[s] efollower.txt (making npc essential)[/s]
			            - argonian.txt (making argonian female follower)
			 
1.0 - first release

[size=5][u][b]FAQ:[/b][/u][/size]
----
1)  Q: [b]Is destination folder for files /skyrim or /skyrim/data?[/b]
     A: It is really /SKYRIM/DATA folder.


2)	Q:	[b]When I write \"bat follower.txt\" console writes \"Batch file could not be found/opened.\" error. How to correct this?[/b]
	A:	Make sure you copied files right into /skyrim/data...if doesn\'t work after that, move them one folder up to /skyrim and try again.


3)	Q:	[b]Will this work exactly on X character or Y boss?[/b]
	A:	I can\'t tell you! This depends on lot of factors and everyones game is \"unique\". Try and see.


4)	Q:	[b]Why npc I hired doesn\'t use weapons?[/b]
	A:	It probably doesn\'t have if you used this on citizen etc. Open trade menu trought dialogue and give him a weapon.


5)	Q:	[b]What is command mode and how to use it?[/b]
	A:	Command mode is shortcut for dialogue option \"I need you to do something.\" Simply..go close to your follower, aim on him and hold \"E\" then aim somwhere somewhere else and hit \"E\" once. Close this mod with \"TAB\".


6)	Q:	[b]Will this make my wife/husband that defaultly can\'t follow available as follower?[/b]
	A:	YES, you can make even not follower spouse to be one.
		But there is catch: 1) You have to use this bat on spouse before you marry.
							2) Then marry.
							3) Then everything should work properly.
			
							
7)	Q:	[b]How to make npc non follower again? How to revert this?[/b]
	A:	It\'s pretty simple. Just ask them to follow and then choose dialogue option \"we have to part ways\" and they will go to their default location and they wont be followers again + quests related to them should work correctly.


8)	Q:	[b]Does this works on Khajiits and Argonians?[/b]
	A:	Yes this works on Khajiit and Argonian MALE npcs.


9)	Q: [b]How to make follower from Argonian FEMALE?[/b]
	A:  Use \"argonian.txt\" instead of \"follower.txt\".


[s]10)	Q:	[b]How to make female argonian essential?[/b]
	A:	Combine these bats. Use \"efollower\" first and then \"argonian\".[/s]
		

11)	Q:	[b]What\'s the difference between type of files? When should I use what?[/b]
	A:	[s]- For defaultly essential npcs use \"efollower\" because it will keep them unkillable. You can also use it to make normal npc unkillable (lydia for example)
		- For defaultly non essential npcs use \"follower\" unless you want to make them unkillable. This will make them killable.[/s]
               - Followers -> For everyone but argonian females use \"follower\" 
	       - Followers -> For argonian females use \"argonian\". This is usefull only for this race. 
	       - Spouse    -> Use \"spouse\" on females and males. works on both. Some races are not supported.
		- Divorce   -> If you get tire of your spouse..simply use this and you can be free or marry someone else.
author: Hirodina
